content.text: Match ends, Borussia Dortmund 1(5), Manchester City 1(6).
Second Half ends, Borussia Dortmund 1, Manchester City 1.

Goal!  Borussia Dortmund 1, Manchester City 1. Christian Pulisic (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Shinji Kagawa following a corner.
Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by Fernandinho.
Shinji Kagawa (Borussia Dortmund) has gone down, but that's a dive.
Substitution, Manchester City. Raheem Sterling replaces Yaya Touré.
Substitution, Manchester City. Nolito replaces Wilfried Bony.
Foul by Moritz Leitner (Borussia Dortmund).
Yaya Touré (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Pulisic (Borussia Dortmund).
Foul by Aleix García (Manchester City).
Gonzalo Castro (Borussia Dortmund) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Borussia Dortmund. Moritz Leitner tries a through ball, but Shinji Kagawa is caught offside.
Goal!  Borussia Dortmund 0, Manchester City 1. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by David Silva.
Substitution, Manchester City. Angeliño replaces Aleksandar Kolarov.
Felix Passlack (Borussia Dortmund) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov.

Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Jacob Bruun Larsen replaces Nuri Sahin.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Marco Hober replaces Adrián Ramos.

First Half begins.
Penalty Shootout ends, Borussia Dortmund 1(5), Manchester City 1(6).
Penalty saved! Mikel Merino (Borussia Dortmund) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Borussia Dortmund 1(5), Manchester City 1(6). Angeliño (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty saved! Jacob Bruun Larsen (Borussia Dortmund) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.

Goal!  Borussia Dortmund 1(3), Manchester City 1(4). Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
